text: Very friendly service, and lots of options to choose from. The sweets are great as well.
Wonderful service each time I have visited. Love the layout and design, it feels very spacious. I've only had the desserts and cookies so far, and they always taste nice and fresh.

They have some nice Pakistani methai options, Ghulab Jaman, Amrati, maisu and chum chum I would say better than bismillah sweets     They need to improve on chicken patties,  lacks layers and proper baking (if the owner is reading) white Rus gula had a burnt flavour. Baloshahi was really bad    Beef parties were really good.   Shop ambiance is just amazing.
